meanings.definition: To move or pass back and forth over or across
meanings.sent1: The cat crisscrosses the room chasing a toy.
meanings.sent2: The busy streets crisscrosses each other in the city center.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel crisscrosses the yard in search of acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts crisscrosses her mind like a tangled web.
meanings.sent5: The river crisscrosses the valley, creating a beautiful landscape.

meanings.definition: A pattern of intersecting lines or paths
meanings.sent1: The fence has a crisscrosses design made of wooden planks.
meanings.sent2: The crisscrosses of the train tracks create a mesmerizing view.
meanings.sent3: The crisscrosses of the spider web caught the morning dew.
meanings.sent4: The crisscrosses of the city streets can be confusing for newcomers.
meanings.sent5: The crisscrosses of the hiking trails lead to breathtaking viewpoints.
